noSimilarFound: No similar positions found. Create your own!
myPositionsSubtitle: Positions you hold that others can chat with you about
chattingListSubtitle: Positions you've chatted about or saved to discuss later
chattingListInfoP1: This list contains other people's positions that you've previously chatted about, as well as positions you've saved by tapping the chat button on a card.
chattingListInfoP2: These will periodically reappear in your card queue. Toggle items on/off to control which ones are active, or remove them entirely.
noMatchingPositions: No matching positions found, or all matches are already in your list.
searchMinChars: Type at least {{min}} characters to search
emptyChattingSubtitle: Swipe up on position cards to add them here. You'll be able to request chats with the people who hold these positions.
noRulesDefined: No rules have been defined yet.
failedAddToList: Failed to add to chatting list
bannedSubtitle: You cannot create positions while your account is suspended. Check the card queue for more details.
